channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Queen (Unknown Special)
channel.description:
**The Queen - Special [Unique]** -
**Immune to conversion** **Does not count as 1-3 neutrals if Queen is Neutral** **Not guaranteed**
**Faction**: ? **(Same as King at start)**
**Goal:** Survive to see the first King **Alive at the end**, **Or step up and win by yourself**
**Passives:**
**I will do it myself:** If you step up, You will become death immune at night and you will keep all your abilities, you will not get the King abilities.
**Royal blood:** You can step up before others if king dies.
**Day abilities:**
**Queen Power:** Your next vote will count for 3, **2 uses** **Decide Fate:** Choose the fate yourself, It will say in court the Queen made it. **1 use**
**Night Abilities:**
**Enemies!:** Check if a player can kill members of your faction (Includes Butler/Alchemist/Mercenary and all classes who can kill your faction members) **(3 uses)** **Order Jail:** Send somebody to a Jail, he cant go to court during the day, he will be released at night. **(Infinite uses)**

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Queen (Unknown Special)
item.dc:creator: Cuatrolan
item.description:
I think you dont understand the passive.

You DO NOT GET King abilities, you keep the Queen ones.
Yes, 2 uses of Allies is powerful, but Queen needs it.
No guards, no extra uses. Queen keeps the abilities.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Queen (Unknown Special)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Yeah, so does it go on the list as whatever King is?

Order Jail seems useless to BD, as it prevents someone from being lynched, even if valid evidence comes up.

Still, Allies is Allies, regardless of uses.

I will do it myself means you keep Queen Power, an extra use of decide fate (even if you merge decide fares, it becomes 3 with the Royal Finger). And Allies and Order Jail is in addition to Guards! Also that would give you Guards and Death Immunity, so it would be used to protect allies.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Queen (Unknown Special)
item.dc:creator: Cuatrolan
item.description:
Queen faction is the same as King faction at the start.

Order Jail is occupation at Day, a special ability. Queen can use It to avoid a vote, avoid execution to a target because he is not in Court, or just to avoid the Assassin/Cult Leader poisoning

Allies on Queen has only 2 uses.

Passives are not the same as the other abilities. Royal blood and Immunity to death at night IF YOU STEP UP

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Queen (Unknown Special)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Where does this fit on the list? It’s not a neutral, BD, or evil, so it would need somewhere to go.

Order Jail would suck to have used on you since you can’t speak to anybody. If you can’t even hear them, it’s ten times worse. It’s just not fun to have used on you. Also it’s pretty useless if you are BD sided.

There’s a reason we removed allies from the King. Since the Queen is with the King, they would just feed him Allies! results.

Also with the Passive, that results you in having 3 night abilities, and the same with the day abilities.

Read full topic
